title: 3 KDP Niches  Low Competition High Keyword Score #KDPKeywords  KDP Low Content Books Tutorial

tactics.name: keyword_research
tactics.description: Analyze high keyword score niches with search volume under 1000
source_quotes: i usually go by anything that is higher than 45

tactics.name: Review Analysis + BSR Check
tactics.description: Evaluate product reviews and BSR scores to identify niches with low competition and high keyword relevance
steps: Scroll through product reviews to identify common criticisms
Check BSR scores and search volume thresholds
Analyze product descriptions for formatting improvements
caveats: When niche-specific content saturation exceeds 1000 searches
source_quotes: keep in mind um these reviews and also remember that the customer is always right

tactics.name: Keyword Placement Strategy
tactics.description: Use high keyword score terms in title, subtitle, and description for better ranking
steps: Use keywords in title with score 67
caveats: Requires proper formatting for Amazon optimization
source_quotes: you can use it for the subtitle and use the first keyword...

heuristics.name: review_analysis
heuristics.condition: If niche has 67%+ positive reviews and <5% negative reviews, prioritize
source_quotes: the majority around 67 percent is positive five full star reviews

heuristics.name: Review Volume Heuristic
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200 then boost
source_quotes: great reviews over seventy percent uh voted that this is a five star um purchase

heuristics.name: Low Review Niche Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize niches with high keyword scores
source_quotes: search total search result results are which makes it perfect because it is under 1 000

niche_patterns.description: Combine target audience with specific content type and aesthetic
